mapper.select: select course_name from entry_sel_master where rcrt_NO = #{entryRcrtNo};
select msg_div, msg_cont from entry_sel_msg as msg where msg.RCRT_NO = #{entryRcrtNo} and msg.MSG_DIV = #{msgDiv};
select email from entry_apply_master as master where master.email = #{email};
select email from entry_apply_master as master where master.email = #{email} and master.birthday = #{password};
